2_1MCsyW6W243LY69ZYm99XbV3M8Gbbrp5hF.body: I need to find a way sperate zeronet and clearnet, some people also embedd images from regular websites … that's stupid

> [odd](#comment_3_1EMpuiFM1NLZmAVyoAWnwi8VwiZVV4dcnN): Use Tor Browser then clearnet requests go over Tor. Or change the network settings in your browser so 'localhost,127.0.0.1' only work and the rest are denied. You can do this in Firefox by setting up a proxy that does not exist (ie. on a port you have nothing running on) but have localhost excluded.

I'm now visiting zn via a own icecat profile with invalid proxy setting, this also kills http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Ey8WR7e3quTdPTMZZKDdqw2U6JG3zvkHe … seem to work out

1_1JEmH2pfXkpMMdzsJ256jzq2GTSxEacS2B.body: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz/?1PVcdu7USZH2kHMETbqDYLPjJZKCDWM52k_10 script for blocking unwanted images -> disallow zeronet to open them

Just looked in their conten.json … it's located in the Russian board. I have `Download and help distribute all files` active for 0chan. Furthermore I think everybody could put any picture they like into their user directory and sign it. At least on 0chan. Only those who use distribute all and those who know the filename could access them

I blocked them with the script I posted below.

## Do not visit those links via your browser, better check if they are in your data/ directory and block if they are there
